Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout

[Groovy] Class Asc2Xml

      • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.Asc2Xml

      • Converts ASC ASCII files to XML representation

        Authors:
        cmahnke
